venue.address_1: 200 North Dartmouth Mall, Smith Mills, MA
venue.name: North Dartmouth Mall

item.description: We are an organization in Bristol County Massachusetts called Bristol County For Ron Paul. We're planning a sign wave for this coming weekend, Saturday, March 3rd on the corner of Faunce Corner Road and Route 6 in North Dartmouth, MA. We'll be meeting in the North Dartmouth Mall parking lot. Here's the event on Facebook: https://www.facebook.... Here's the other event on Meetup: http://www.meetup.com... Our last sign wave in Seekonk, MA drew 45 people! It was a huge success and people drove from all over to get there, including Boston and Worcester. We're hoping to pull in about 100 people this time around! Please come out if you can donate an hour or so! Thanks! Bristol County For Ron Paul facebook.com/bristolcountyforronpaul bristolcountyforronpaul.com
item.name: Ron Paul Sign Wave - North Dartmouth, MA
